game.title: The Lost Scrolls
game.objective: Find and retrieve the lost scrolls
game.description: Ancient scrolls holding forbidden knowledge were stolen by the dark wizard. Locate the dark wizard's den, find the scrolls and return them to the High Mage.

task.description: Follow the trail of dark magic to find the wizard's den. Be careful, as the way is full of traps and dark creatures.
Search for the stolen scrolls. You may need to fight the dark wizard or his minions. Do not let the scrolls fall into the wrong hands.
With the scrolls in hand, make your way back to High Mage Erendil at the castle. Watch out for the dark wizard's minions who may be chasing you.
